alert.note: Alert for Greater Vancouver Area (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 22 at 5:45PM PDT by NWS Portland
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Clark County through 615 PM PDT... At 545 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Hockinson, or near Battle Ground, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Battle Ground, Walnut Grove, Hockinson, Mount Vista, Venersborg, Barberton, Orchards, Five Corners, Meadow Glade, Salmon Creek, Dollar Corner, Hazel Dell North, Mill Plain, Brush Prairie, Elkhorn Mountain, Alpine, Salmon Falls, Sifton, Camp Bonneville and Minnehaha. This includes the following highways in Washington... Interstate 205 between mile markers 32 and 36. State Route 503 between mile markers 2 and 8. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
